DescriptionFormatTextId.SourceString: Text_When you deal damage to a target, gain <Constant Type="Float" Format="FromZero">[0]%</> chance to emit a poison cloud for <Constant Type="Integer">[1] seconds</>, dealing <Exec.MagicalDamageBase>[0] _</> every 2 seconds to enemies within its area. Up to <Constant Type="Integer">[2]</> poison clouds can exist at a time and the wielder is immune to damage from poison clouds.
DescriptionFormatTextId.LocalizedString: When you deal damage to a target, gain <Constant Type="Float" Format="FromZero">[0]%</> chance to emit a poison cloud for <Constant Type="Integer">[1] seconds</>, dealing <Exec.MagicalDamageBase>[0] _</> every second to enemies within its area. Up to <Constant Type="Integer">[2]</> poison clouds can exist at a time and the wielder is immune to damage from poison clouds.
